Page n of nn

Duties and Responsibilities of a RSO

A RSO always focuses on safety first!

 

A RSO must:

 

•know the policies that direct how to conduct range activities and handle air rifles,

•constantly supervise participants and the range area; and

•manage risks as they occur.

 

Click on each photo to learn more.  You must review the information in all three before proceeding to the next section.
